project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would consist of the following elements: (a) construction and improvement of the Cotabato-Digos road of about 160 km in Mindanao; (b) consultants' services for: (i) construction supervision of the Cotabato-Digos road; (ii) detailed engineering of this road and the Cabanatuan-Tuguegaro and Lucena-Legaspi roads in Luzon; (iii) detailed engineering of about 700 km of roads to be selected from item (c) below; (c) feasibility studies of about 1,000 km of roads; and (d) technical assistance to the Bureau of Public Highways (BPH) for operational improvements.
